thread.title_full: The Best Accessories For You Announced Their New Product The Silicone Brush Set | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: The Best Accessories For You Announced Their New Product The Silicone Brush Set
text:
(MENAFN Press) The is the company that brought innovative products in the market announced their new product. The Silicone Brush Set differs from the traditional cooking brushes because of its durability and modern design. No more loose stubborn or lost bristles. Clean up is easy in the dishwasher and these bristles won't clump frizz or retain odours. The Silicone Brush Set is for basting marinades and sauces and could use for pastries as well. With Heat Resistant Silicone bristles up to 50 degrees that control the amount of glaze or marinade which is applied and ensure that it is spread evenly and efficiently. It can also be used for brushing hot pan or on the grill and the angled brush head keeps bristles off the counter top.  Using a pastry brush offer baked goods an even golden brown color. Keeping two or more around is very useful it evens out the color of the dish without fully baking it. Which works like a natural bristle brush but with the added conveniences of heat resistance odor resistance and clean ability. Multiple layers of silicone bristles tackle all tasks. Gaps in the center bristles hold liquid as easily transfer sauces from the bowl to the work surface and tapered outer bristles lets the user baste poultry and roasts with ease. 
The Brush set comes in three different sizes: a small 7" Pastry Brush there's the 8.5" Cooking Brush for basting ribs and the 14" Barbecue Brush with a long 12" handle offers a safe distance between the user and the heat. Keep beef poultry or fish moist by spreading with marinades and sauces. 
This  is easy to use; just screw onto the top of any standard glass or plastic bottle so user can baste their food directly from the bottle and another brush with a stainless-steel heat-resistant handle for those larger grilling jobs. Just rinse clean with soapy hot water all the time so the user can use it anywhere from cooking and to grilling. 
The Silicone Brush will soon be available exclusively at Amazon.
About The Best Accessories For You
The Best Accessories For You is a company dedicated to directly satisfy their clients' wildest dreams and desires. Their core ideas flow around the thought that products should be able to provide more than expected. That is why their  come always in a set giving more to the buyer besides proving to be up to date in today's fashion.
